name: screechy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a long, loud, high noise that is unpleasant to hear: Opera singers can sound a bit screechy. Bending over his electric guitar, he attacked the strings, creating loud, screechy feedback and buzz.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had a high, screechy soprano voice that made nails on a blackboard seem like a lullaby to the ears.I thought the band was terrible - screechy, ear-splitting guitars and a jumble of sounds that I just didn't get."Well," he says, adopting a screechy whine of a voice.The front door is broken, so students come and go through a screechy side entrance.
